data.text: @LotusPrince Yeah, that's what bugs me the most with it.

@Dragons_Dusk People have the right to be afraid of getting called, of course. Trump avoided the Army - whatever. But now he brags about how he would've been great if he'd joined.  The guy who made excuses not to join.  Right.

@LotusPrince I remember talking with my Band Director in HS about Vietnam.  How he watched his friends get called up one by one and how scared he was but didn't like run off or anything.  I'm not saying every President needs to be military, just... fucking actually understand their purpose.
@Dragons_Dusk For real. I don't have family in the military, but if I did, I really would get slightly nauseous if something happened and they were "honored" under the current administration.
